meanings.definition: A gathering or event for scouts or other youth organizations to participate in outdoor activities.
meanings.sent1: The camporee was filled with exciting outdoor games and adventures.
meanings.sent2: We all had a great time at the camporee, exploring nature and learning new skills.
meanings.sent3: During the camporee, the scouts tried to see who could roast the most marshmallows without burning them.
meanings.sent4: The camporee was a beacon of fun in the midst of the wilderness.
meanings.sent5: The camporee left a lasting impression on all the participants, inspiring them to love the outdoors.

meanings.definition: The location where a camporee is held.
meanings.sent1: The camporee site was nestled in a beautiful forest clearing.
meanings.sent2: We set up our tents at the camporee and enjoyed the peaceful surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The camporee location had the perfect spot for stargazing at night.
meanings.sent4: The camporee grounds were like a hidden gem waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The camporee venue provided a picturesque backdrop for all the outdoor activities.
